title: Ethereal Anime Essence
caption: A delicate balance of light and shade encapsulates the essence of fantasy.
style: Portrait sketched in charcoal with smudged highlights
character_size: Dominant, occupying three-quarters of the frame
character_facing: Gazing towards the viewer's right, eyes slightly downcast
dimensionality: Flat with subtle depth created by shadow
art_profile: High-contrast with an emphasis on deep shadows and bright highlights that fade into the background
